title: Genesis and Exodus in Vanuatu Bislama
title_vernacular: La Genese et L'Exode en Bichelamar de Vanuatu
description_vernacular:
Wok blong tanem OLTESTEMAN i go long Bislama i stap aninit long Kristin Kaonsel blong Vanuatu, long han blong Ofis blong Bislama Translesen,
long **Kokonas", long Santo. Tufala buk ya Jenesis mo Eksodas, tufala i wok long tim blong translesen long ofis ya, mo tufala i kamaot fastaem blong ol man oli save yusum, be bambae tufala i kamaot bakegen wetem ol narafala buk long BAEBOL LONG BISLAMA.

links.title: Bislama (1988) Genesis Portion
links.provider: Bible Society of the South Pacific
links.publisher: Bible Society in the South Pacific
